name: LawInc
description: The Law Firm of the Digital Age
overview:
LawInc is a whole new kind of law firm which delivers premium and affordable legal services to start-ups, entrepreneurs and business owners by re-defining the practice of law and providing a low cost/high quality one-stop legal shop.

Each year, thousands of entrepreneurs and business owners lose everything because they fail to properly form and maintain their businesses. LawInc is a seasoned corporate law firm which helps ensures proper business formation and maintenance.

LawInc recognizes that its clients are unique and, accordingly, worthy of high quality legal services that are tailored to their individual requirements. At the same time, it also realize that its clients share a common desire to manage their legal expenses.

LawInc sees no need why legal costs should remain an unidentified variable over which the client has no power and very limited knowledge. It believe that personalized legal counseling, excellent client service and preset fees at reasonable rates can co-exist. Accordingly, LawInc offers legal services on a flat fee or fixed plan basis. LawInc’s innovative billing method takes the practice of law to a new level, avoiding the traditional approach of billing by the hour.
